fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Place a bounty on one players head each day.

Evils will be notified of who the bounty is on.

The town will only know a bounty was placed.

- Killing this bounty increases the killers defense by one level for two nights, hanging the bounty will yield no results and allow the Sailor to cast again.

- If after two days, the bounty is not killed, a powerful attack may be dealt by the Sailor at any given night.

- **You may only bounty once and the target cannot be switched unless he is hung.**
